sentences.english: A man jumps from the upper floors of the burning North Tower of New York's World Trade Center, on September 11, 2001.(AP
sentences.chinese: 一個人從正在燃燒的北塔的更上部跳下。

sentences.english: Dust, smoke and debris fill the air asone of the World Trade Center towers in New York City collapses in thisSeptember 11, 2001 photo.
sentences.chinese: 北塔坍塌時空氣中充滿了粉塵，煙以及碎片。

sentences.english: North tower was begun in 1450 but nearly completed.
sentences.chinese: 北塔於1450年動工興建，但始終未竣工。

sentences.english: A man jumps from the North Tower of New York's World Trade Center on Tuesday, September 11, 2001.(AP
sentences.chinese: 一個人叢世貿中心北塔跳下。

sentences.english: People hang from the windows of the North Tower of the World TradeCenter after a hijacked airliner hit the building September 11, 2001 inNew York City.(Jose
sentences.chinese: 在被劫持飛機撞擊北塔後攀附於窗外的人。

sentences.english: Dust, smoke and ash engulf buildingsaround the World Trade Center in New York City, after the collapse of bothtowers on September 11, 2001.
sentences.chinese: 北塔坍塌時塵煙以及灰吞沒了世貿中心周圍的建築。
